mapper.insert: insert into staffs (staff_name, staff_phone, staff_login_id, staff_login_pwd, hospital_id, staff_role) values (#{staff_name}, #{staff_phone}, #{staff_login_id}, #{staff_login_pwd}, #{hospital_id}, 'ROLE_NURSE')
mapper.select: select s.hospital_id, s.staff_id, s.staff_login_pwd, s.staff_name, s.staff_phone, s.staff_login_id, s.staff_role, s.staff_enabled, h.hospital_name from staffs s, hospitals h where s.hospital_id = h.hospital_id and s.hospital_id = #{hospital_id} and s.staff_role = 'ROLE_NURSE'
select count(*) from staffs where staff_enabled = 0
